value.title: Logging
value.toolTip: The settings for the 'Cart Logger' system.

value.title: Settings
value.toolTip: The settings for the 'Cart Logger' system.

value.title: Categories
value.toolTip: The categories the logging system has and their states.

value.title: Use logs
value.toolTip: Defines if the logs are shown at all.

value.title: Production build logs
value.toolTip: Defines if the logs will show in production builds or not.

value.title: Force Show Error Logs
value.toolTip: Defines if error logs will always show regardless of other settings.
